title: I fucking "love" this game sometimes.
body:
I get reported for "intentionally feeding and trolling" when they have a Brand and Jinx kill botlane while I have a Teemo supp trying to go in and getting us killed all the time while the person reported me ran it down botlane and gave them a free kill.

How does the instant feedback system deal with this?

God I wish I never hit Silver. I fucking wish I stayed in Bronze because there's more bullshit in this division.

replies.body:
to be honest, if your support is an idiot, why did you follow him? There is no reason to die with your team, if they do something dumb, you have the option of just walking away and honestly by following that teemo, instead of having 1 feeder on the team, your team now had to deal with 2. 

Also you can get reported for all sorts of things, especially in low elo. Things such as picking a champion for your lane that you got assigned but someone else on your team decided they didn't want to support and wanted to steal mid or top or whatever (I'm a support main so I always get my lane). Picking an ap support champion like sona, morgana, zyra, ect...  and not picking a tank even though you have an irelia top, because your adc wanted alistair or something and yet you know that a magic damage carry champion would be better because everyone else on your team is ad (Zed mid, Irelia top,  jungle pantheon and Ashe adc) and will be shut down the moment the enemy toplane malphite decides that he should buy an armour item or the jungle rammus decides to just get 2 thornmails (even though passive doesn't stack) because yolo. I even once got reported because my adc was feeding and this was because I wasn't peeling enough and following him (to be fair I was alistair) whilst he decided that at 1-3-0 it would be a good idea to proxy behind tower against a 4-0 jihn.

Try not to get too angry about being reported because no matter how nice, skilled and chipper you are, eventually some knobhead is going to report you, but these odd reports aren't going to be remotely enough to ban you, so don't get stressed about it.

If I get a troll/silly support I just stand at the turret and wave clear under it. With the changes made to bot lane however, Bot lane just becomes an enemy team party  because they know my supp is not warding and is feeding.

> God I wish I never hit Silver. I fucking wish I stayed in Bronze because there's more bullshit in this division.

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/000/045/n725075089_288918_2774.jpg

no, you really don't.
You really are just the meme lord of the OCE boards aren't you
If only we had a memes section like na ......

Fake reports are pretty annoying, but the game will still get reviewed. If you are found to not be doing anything against the rules, the report is disregarded and nothing happens to you. The players that reported you have their "report credibility" go down, so when they further report players (and probably further troll report more players) their reports mean less and less. 

Report accurately and you will see more "a player has been punished" messages :)

> [{quoted}](name=xDarkRavenx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=216G9Rg8,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-27T08:47:49.166+0000)
>
> God I wish I never hit Silver. I fucking wish I stayed in Bronze because there&#039;s more bullshit in this division.

This is so true of season 6 in oce. Absolute muppets are in silver.

The feedback system will review your game and know if you intentioanlly fed or not. You don't need to worry about false banning however if it does happen you can send a support ticket to Riot and defend your case

You'd be surprised at the amount of salt in Gold. In all honesty having worked my way out of bronze it's the same shit with a slightly different smell. I hate to break it to those in silver and bronze but it doesn't get much better. Gold is just full of boosted accounts and people thinking they are Faker who know best.

I always went in balls to the wall if a team mate went in, regardless of the odds. Or sacrifice myself (support main) to get my adc out. Mainly because I didn't want to be flamed for not helping etc.
But I have only recently decided stuff going in if it's not favorable. As Nightjar said, no point having an extra feeder on the team.

Having said that, I find it hard to believe there is more salt in any division than bronze lol
